TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IApplicationPreloadUtil

Docs.summary: Provides methods that ASP.NET uses to communicate with [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] while the server preloads an application.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetApplicationPreloadInfo (string context, out bool enabled, out string startupObjType, out string[] parametersForStartupObj);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetApplicationPreloadInfo(string context, bool enabled, string startupObjType, string[] parametersForStartupObj) cil managed

Docs.param: When this method returns, contains to indicate that the application has to be preloaded; otherwise, . This parameter is passed uninitialized.
When this method returns, contains a string that identifies the managed type that is part of the preload process. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
When this method returns, contains the data that will be passed to the preloaded type. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
Docs.summary: Gets initialization data that is required in order to preload an application. This method is called by ASP.NET.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ReportApplicationPreloadFailure (string context, int errorCode, string errorMessage);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportApplicationPreloadFailure(string context, int32 errorCode, string errorMessage) cil managed

Docs.summary: Reports that an error occurred in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] while the server was preloading the ASP.NET application.
